scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a burial procession. In the foreground, a figure in a dark, patterned cloak, likely a cleric, leads a group of four individuals. One of these, dressed in white, carries a staff topped with a cross. To the left, a man is actively digging a grave, with a shovel in hand, over a shrouded body lying on the ground. In the background, architectural structures, including buildings with arched windows and towers, are visible, suggesting a town or city setting. The overall atmosphere is somber and devotional, likely representing a funeral rite.
